info.description:
A service that permits to handle nodoInviaRPT and nodoInviaCarrelloRPT request from WISP, converting them in NMU payments.

**STANDARD ERRORS:**
NAME | CODE | DESCRIPTION
- | - | -
**WIC-500** | *ERROR* |  *...error description...*
**WIC-1000** | *GENERIC_ERROR* | Error while executing conversion flow.  *...error description...*
**WIC-1001** | *PARSING_GENERIC_ERROR* | Error while parsing payload.  *...error description...*
**WIC-1002** | *PARSING_INVALID_HEADER* | Error while parsing payload. The SOAP header in payload is invalid:  *...error description...*
**WIC-1003** | *PARSING_INVALID_BODY* | Error while parsing payload. The SOAP body in payload is invalid:  *...error description...*
**WIC-1004** | *PARSING_INVALID_XML_NODES* | Error while parsing payload. The list of nodes extracted from document must be greater than zero, but currently it is zero.
**WIC-1005** | *PARSING_INVALID_ZIPPED_PAYLOAD* | Error while parsing payload. Cannot unzip payload correctly.
**WIC-1006** | *PARSING_PRIMITIVE_NOT_VALID* | Error while checking primitive. Primitive  [*...content...*] not valid.
**WIC-1100** | *VALIDATION_INVALID_MULTIBENEFICIARY_CART* | Error while generating debt position for GPD service. The cart is defined as multi-beneficiary but there are a number of RPTs lower than 2.
**WIC-1101** | *VALIDATION_INVALID_IBANS* | Error while generating debt position for GPD service. The IBAN field must be set if digital stamp is not defined for the transfer.
**WIC-1102** | *VALIDATION_INVALID_DEBTOR* | Error while generating debt position for GPD service. The debtor subject information is different between the various RPT of the cart.
**WIC-1103** | *VALIDATION_INVALID_CREDITOR_INSTITUTION* | Error while generating debt position for GPD service. The creditor institution information is different between the various RPT of the cart.
**WIC-1200** | *CONFIGURATION_INVALID_STATION* | Error while generating cart for Checkout service. No valid station found with code  [*...content...*].
**WIC-2000** | *PERSISTENCE_RPT_NOT_FOUND* | Error while retrieving RPT. RPT with sessionId  [*...content...*] not found.
**WIC-2001** | *PERSISTENCE_REQUESTID_CACHING_ERROR* | Error while caching RequestID.  *...error description...*
**WIC-3000** | *CLIENT_GPD* | Error while communicating with GPD service. Status  [*...content...*] -  *...error description...*
**WIC-3001** | *CLIENT_IUVGENERATOR_INVALID_RESPONSE* | Error while communicating with IUV Generator service. Status  [*...content...*] -  *...error description...*
**WIC-3002** | *CLIENT_DECOUPLER_CACHING* | Error while communicating with decoupler caching API. Status  [*...content...*] -  *...error description...*
**WIC-3003** | *CLIENT_CHECKOUT* | Error while communicating with Checkout service. status  [*...content...*] -  *...error description...*
**WIC-3004** | *CLIENT_CHECKOUT_NO_REDIRECT_LOCATION* | Error while communicating with Checkout service. No valid 'Location' header was found,
**WIC-3005** | *CLIENT_CHECKOUT_INVALID_REDIRECT_LOCATION* | Error while communicating with Checkout service. An empty 'Location' header was found.
info.title: WISP Converter

get.summary: Return OK if application is started

parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.
parameters.name: X-Request-Id

get.description:
**Description:**  
Redirecting the payment flow from WISP to Checkout. In order to do so, the NodoInviaRPT and NodoInviaCarrelloRPT requests will be converted in NMU payments and handled by GPD system.  

**API properties:**
Property | Value
- | -
Internal | Y
External | N
Synchronous | SYNC
Authorization | NONE
Authentication | APIKEY
TPS | 1.0/sec
Idempotency | Y
Stateless | Y
Read/Write Intense | Read and Write
Cacheable | N

parameters.description: The identifier of the payment, referenced by session and creditor institution broker.
parameters.name: sessionId

422.description: Unprocessable request. Returns a static page with the error code.

get.summary: Redirect payment from WISP to Checkout

parameters.description: This header identifies the call, if not passed it is self-generated. This ID is returned in the response.
parameters.name: X-Request-Id

ApiKey.description: The API key to access this function app.
ApiKey.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key
